invocations.description: Sets the background color of the element to color. This function should only be used if you're using Windows XP.
invocations.ex:
init start
	if $windowsxp then
		setbkgcolor(0xFFFFFF)
	end
init end
auto(200)
setfontstyle('MS Serif', 9, 100, 0x000000)
drawtext('testing...', 0, 0)
invocations.exDescription: Will set the background color to white if you are using Windows XP, and will draw a testing text with color black.
